General.Name: UAS Drone Corp
General.Description: UAS Drone Corp. operates as a robotics company. The company develops an advanced robotics system that enables remote, real-time, and pinpoint accurate firing of small arms and light weapons. It offers UAS octocopter, which integrates six degrees of freedom robotic gimbal for military and homeland security purposes. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Tirat Carmel, Israel.
